data.title: Wayland Academy Private High School
data.meta_description: Private boarding and day school for students in 9 through 12 grade. Located in the heart of the Midwest.
data.text:
Wayland students participate in all aspects of campus life. Learning occurs anytime, anywhere with peers, mentor teachers, and our nurturing faculty.

Our purposeful focus on each individual leads to personal learning plans for student success!

Come discover our heartland vibes where liberal arts meets innovation.

At Wayland you have the opportunity to explore your talents (even the ones you haven't discovered yet), grow your leadership skills, and find your own way to shineâ€”alongside other students who are rooting for your success.

An institution of excellence since 1855. Wayland Academy prepares each student for college and life beyond through a liberal arts curriculum and campus programs devoted to the pursuit of knowledge and the development of character. We've been living this mission for more than 169 years.
